verses.text: The wilderness and the solitary place shall be glad \add for\add* them; And the desert shall rejoice, and blossom as the rose.

It shall blossom abundantly and rejoice Even \add with\add* joy and singing: The glory of Lebanon shall be given unto it, The excellency of Carmel and Sharon, They shall see the glory of the \sc Lord\sc*, \add And\add* the excellency of our God.
Strengthen ye the weak hands, And confirm the feeble knees.
Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: Behold, your God will come \add with\add* vengeance, \add Even\add* God \add with\add* a recompence; He will come and save you.
Then the eyes of the blind shall be opened, And the ears of the deaf shall be unstopped.
Then shall the lame \add man\add* leap as a hart, And the tongue of the dumb sing: For in the wilderness shall waters break out, And streams in the desert.
And the parched ground shall become a pool, And the thirsty land springs of water: In the habitation of dragons, where each lay, \add Shall be\add* grass with reeds and rushes.

And a highway shall be there, and a way, And it shall be called The way of holiness; The unclean shall not pass over it; but it \add shall be\add* for those: The wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err \add therein\add*.
No lion shall be there, Nor \add any\add* ravenous beast shall go up thereon, It shall not be found there; But the redeemed shall walk \add there:\add*

And the ransomed of the \sc Lord\sc* shall return, And come \add to\add* Zion with songs And everlasting joy upon their heads: They shall obtain joy and gladness, And sorrow and sighing shall flee away.
